import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './Card.module.css' const Card = ({item}) => { const src1=item.img; const src2=item.img2; return (
e.target.src=src2} onMouseLeave={(e)=>e.target.src=src1}/>

{item.title}

${item.oldPrice} ${item.price}
) } export default Card
